text: idol worshipers kazhemo, "Mav BOHA willed, my by ne obozhnyuvaly budʹ- yakykh idoliv krim Yoho, ne by nashykh batʹkiv. Ne by my zaboronyayemo budʹ shcho krim Yoho zaborony." Tsey pered tym, yak yim zrobyly toy zhe. Kur'yery mozhutʹ zrobyty budʹ shcho ale mozhutʹ dostavyty povnotsinne povidomlennya
